Got fuel, a chief salad, and a turkey leg, a shower and have visited this location numerous times.  Depends on the time and date, just as anywhere, the experience can be different. ‚Ä¶

One star across the board simply for walking in on me while I was in the shower. I can handle my order being slightly messed up, some cheese on my eggs isn‚Äôt going to kill me. I can handle being referred to as a man, I get it, I have a ‚Ä¶

Good place to stop for night night, shower, eat and drop off yesterday's dinner.

showerReviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, TA is the worst truck stop chain out there. Reserving a shower is a whole adventure. And only the most patient or unemployed driver can actually wait for it. I‚Äôve been sitting here for over an hour waiting for my shower. That ‚Ä¶
terrible, the toilet has no hot water, and towels, the line for the shower is in the hallway, washing machines are "greedy" and charge a commission for credit card payments
They got bk and Taco Bell fresh and hot. Pumps was working shower was hot and clean

I stayed at the TA in Fort Bridger Wyoming last night when I went in for a shower this morning there was something wrong with the computers. An employee named Tod Was working to resolve the issue. Later learn the Todd also keeps the showers ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The restrooms are under renovation right now so the wait for a shower or to use the restroom can be a little longer than normal. Staff here has always been friendly and curious. I just like this place in general.

Shower was nice. Big & roomy. The restaurant part was filthy.  Every table needed cleaned.  The floor was covered in sticky spilled pop and  condiments. When employees weren't busy they stood around talking instead of cleaning.  They need ‚Ä¶
Shower 8 sucks. The hot water doesn‚Äôt work.  Poor quality showers. Like most TAs, not great places.

‚Ä¶ save money and it makes us have to wait longer in line for service... And their kiosk does not work properly is very hard to get a shower ticket..  And they are always working on the pumps whether it's cleaning or maintenance early in the ‚Ä¶
Very Busy Shower Nobody Cleaning  watting To Much Time More then 2 Hour
Very bad place! Went to take a shower in it, the temperature was very low and there was no hot water!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ in line unattended for an extended period of time. To make matters worse, we arrived in hopes of getting a nice, hot shower & eat dinner to signs stating Subway was closed & so were the showers. We arrived around 5:30 PM & left the next ‚Ä¶

4 pumps idle , drivers park at pump and they park in front of pump and go shower , truck stop is backed up to the street , nothing new , i just only finally posted something because Im sick of coming here and losing 2 hours
The showers were very clean and the water was hot.  Russell who was working in the back gave extra care and attention.  He put us in the larger shower stall and extra clean towels to use.

Friendly staff all with great sense of humor that includes the subway staff. Shower clean with great water pressure, even tho the shower heads leak a little. Fully working washer and dryers for laundry. Parking can be a challenge depending ‚Ä¶
While I was waiting shower bus passengers came all the were opened for them while am in line clocked 2hours waiting shower suck
Every time I go into this store and fuel I get ripped off of my points and shower credits ‚Ä¶

Typical Pilot Flying J. Laundry room completely out of order, bathroom dirty, no decent food, parking lot is a mess, some of the pumps not working and shower was lukewarm. PFJ just needs to go out of business and let someone who cares take ‚Ä¶

Noon on a Saturday, parking lot only half full, they have 7 showers but we waited 25 minutes for one. If you're a team trying to shower on 30, consider another place. Otherwise it was clean and well staffed.
Drivers, I'm out of work and made a long trip in my personal. These kind folk gave me a free shower. I hope you make a stop here if you're not sure. They deserve us drivers' money.

I pulled in at 10 am got fuel parked went in and didn't even have to wait for a shower.  So I go back to my truck and hang out, around  2:30 pm I go in and get a couple slices of bbq pizza go back to the truck and eat it and hang out. And ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I booked a shower at 2.30 am in the morning after waiting 30 minutes I went inside and requested them to clean the shower firstly, they lied to me that all the shower are being used ,On the other hand they were not willing to clean it I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a truck driver. But I'm also a young woman. So it is incredibly disturbing to me that an older man would feel so comfortable harassing me while I'm naked in the shower room. One of your employees started knocking on the door and telling ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ were all empty we wanted to clean mirrors and windows which is why parked in the fuel aisle and went in to use the shower just to wash face and use a clean place (the washrooms were horrible) and the bald man goes you can't do it and ‚Ä¶

They don‚Äôt have manners how they talk with drivers . I booked shower they don‚Äôt allow me to use that till my co driver fueling their was one  guy behavior very bad,  he said he will cancel my shower that‚Äôs horrible location

People polite workers that is shower was ok bottom half toilet hadnt beened cleaned in a while but ive seen worse the wendys pretty good staff very polite even did bacon extra crispy for my burger np so over all pretty good not best but not ‚Ä¶

Good parking space clean restrooms but i was there for shower and waited 40 minutes inside the store because i was the next customer in line. The lady working at showers waited for all 5 showers to be free to get them ready again. 2 were ‚Ä¶

I wish I had believed the reviews about how disgustingly dirty the showers are. When I complained to the trans person in attendance that my shower was dirty it gave me another that was even more disgusting. When I pointed that out it took a ‚Ä¶

I like this love's the store is clean and the showers are also clean. The parking lot is not the biggest and fills up quickly. The only complaint I would have is I wish they would fix the faucets in sink in the shower rooms the water gets ‚Ä¶

They have everything you need, but there was some confusion regarding showers. We booked a shower and got the shower pin through the Love's app, so my husband paid for that and a drink refill, and as he walked to get the refill, the towel/ ‚Ä¶

Otrs. If you're moving and need a quick clean shower and a hot burger from Wendy's here's the place. Between 1-3pm Wyoming time you can be in and out and under an hour. Staff actually care about the truckers here. ( personal experience )

showerReviews.reviewText: The first bad experience I've ever had at any of the Little Americas. Taking shower and I'm pretty quick to shower maybe 10 min in and out. The old lady behind counter comes ans knocks on door and says you need to hurry up. Okay, so now i ‚Ä¶

ABF uses this parking lot as their own drop lot. No parking for others. All I wanted to do was take a shower after fueling. No place to park other than the fuel island. Worst Little America ive been to for trucks. To my fellow OTR guys. Don ‚Ä¶

Tons of signs for luxurious trucker showers $18 ... I've been in no name truck stop with cleaner and nicer facilities the shower room was tiny not so much as a towel run over the counter since whoever showered before us. Toilet was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to trucks, it's catered to tourists. They have the fueling islands with a little store where you can shower (wonderful bathrooms btw), but the big store and restaurant etc is away from truck parking. (No trucks allowed) you have to walk ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and when they are cought they try to take it out on the truck drivers.  I hope there is no future problems like the one i had this afternoon.  There is cheep fuel, clean shower, a nice golf course, and a restaurant/bar in the hotel.

‚Ä¶ ok. I came before and got to take a nice bath, with bubble bath. And I was so disappointed to see the ‚ôø shower where the water runs on the floor. Had to put towels down so it wouldn't  go on the carpet it was all the same level.  And I ‚Ä¶

. Pumped fuel went in to take a shower none clean had to wait on cleaning.  After cleaning the floor was wet,ask for another towel and was told by Malisa they did not have anymore. Shower was not clean .staff was rude, parking was a ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 2) Shower looks nice with marble wall n floor. However NO ventilation n its like a Sauna. ‚Ä¶

If you want to come here and drop 12$ for a shower, just to have the extremely rude cashier huff, stomp and slam cupboards and make you feel totally unwelcome  because he has to go clean one of the showers for you... My husband and I put up ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

Western Travel Terminal is a great place to fill up on fuel, on snacks, coffee, to grab a bite to eat, get a clean shower, or drink suds & cocktails. The waitstaff is really friendly & the food tasty. You'd be hard put to find a better ‚Ä¶
